direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve converting a jsoup element to a W3C Document with similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods involve processing and converting documents, though one converts to a W3C Document and the other serializes it to a String.
Both methods involve querying and processing documents, though one uses XPath and the other converts jsoup elements.
Both methods handle null parameters and throw exceptions in a similar manner.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initializing a DocumentBuilder for document processing.
The convert method must be invoked to perform the actual conversion of the jsoup element to a W3C Document.
Both methods handle document processing and serialization, which can inform assertions about the converted document.
